rules_text:
Vigilance, prowess
[i]Lead to Victory[/i] – Other creatures you control get +1/+1 and have melee.
[i]Pair Up [/i]– Whenever Robin, Legendary Tactician attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, reveal the top five cards of your library. Target opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
